attributes.long_name: number of 20Hz measurements in 1Hz C band
attributes.comment: number of 20Hz measurements associated to the 1Hz measurement

attributes.long_name: number of 20Hz measurements in 1Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: number of 20Hz measurements associated to the 1Hz measurement

attributes.long_name: altitude of satellite at 20Hz C band
attributes.comment: altitude of satellite above the reference ellipsoid

attributes.long_name: orbital altitude rate at 20Hz C band
attributes.comment: The reference surface for the orbital altitude rate is the combined mean_sea_surface/geoid surface. It is used to compute the Doppler correction on the altimeter range

attributes.long_name: altitude of the satellite at 20Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: altitude of satellite above the reference ellipsoid

attributes.long_name: orbital altitude rate at 20Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: The reference surface for the orbital altitude rate is the combined mean_sea_surface/geoid surface. It is used to compute the Doppler correction on the altimeter range

attributes.long_name: UTC at 1Hz
day UTC at 1Hz
second in the day UTC at 1Hz
index of the 1Hz measurement in 20Hz C band
attributes.comment: index of the 1Hz measurement associated to the 20Hz measurement, zero index corresponding to the first 1Hz measurement of the dataset

attributes.long_name: index of the first 20Hz measurement in 1Hz C band
attributes.comment: index of the first 20Hz measurement associated to the 1Hz measurement, zero index corresponding to the first 20Hz measurement of the dataset

attributes.long_name: UTC at 20Hz C band
day UTC at 20Hz C band
UTC of the 1Hz measurement
index of the 1Hz measurement in 20Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: index of the 1Hz measurement associated to the 20Hz measurement, zero index corresponding to the first 1Hz measurement of the dataset

attributes.long_name: index of the first 20Hz measurement in 1Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: index of the first 20Hz measurement associated to the 1Hz measurement, zero index corresponding to the first 20Hz measurement of the dataset

attributes.long_name: UTC for 20Hz Ku band
day UTC for 20Hz Ku band
UTC of the 1Hz measurement in Ku band
latitude of the 1Hz measurement
attributes.comment: Positive latitude is North latitude, negative latitude is South latitude.

attributes.long_name: longitude of the 1Hz measurement
attributes.comment: Negative longitude is East longitude relative to Greenwich meridian.

attributes.long_name: latitude of 20Hz measurement in C band
attributes.comment: Positive latitude is North latitude, negative latitude is South latitude.

attributes.long_name: longitude of 20Hz measurement in C band
attributes.comment: Negative longitude is East longitude relative to Greenwich meridian.

attributes.long_name: latitude of 20Hz measurement in Ku band
attributes.comment: Positive latitude is North latitude, negative latitude is South latitude.

attributes.long_name: longitude of 20Hz measurement in Ku band
attributes.comment: Negative longitude is East longitude relative to Greenwich meridian.

attributes.long_name: corrected AGC at 20Hz in C band
attributes.comment: AGC corrected for instrumental errors (agc_cor_20_c). For SAR mode, closest value in time to the reference measurement

attributes.long_name: quality flag for AGC at 20Hz in C band
attributes.comment: Flag indicating the use of the 20Hz estimate of AGC in the computation of 1Hz estimate

attributes.long_name: scaling factor for backscatter coefficient evaluation at 20Hz in C band
attributes.comment: This scaling factor represents the backscatter coefficient for a waveform amplitude equal to 1. It is corrected for AGC instrumental errors (agc_cor_20_c) and internal calibration (sig0_cal_20_c)

attributes.long_name: corrected tracker range for 20Hz in C band
attributes.comment: LRM mode : tracker range corrected for USO frequency drift (uso_cor_20_c), internal path (int_path_cor_20_c) and Doppler correction (dop_cor_l1b_20_c) SAR mode : reference range corrected for USO frequency drift (uso_cor_20_c) and internal path correction (int_path_cor_20_c)

attributes.long_name: corrected AGC at 20Hz in Ku band
attributes.comment: AGC corrected for instrumental errors (agc_cor_20_ku). For SAR mode, closest value in time to the reference measurement

attributes.long_name: quality flag for AGC at 20Hz in Ku band
attributes.comment: Flag indicating the use of the 20Hz estimate of AGC in the computation of 1Hz estimate

attributes.long_name: altitude command H0 computed with navigation and DEM at 20Hz in Ku band
attributes.comment: SAR mode : value the closest in time to the reference measurement

attributes.long_name: scaling factor for backscatter coefficient evaluation at 20Hz in Ku band
attributes.comment: This scaling factor represents the backscatter coefficient for a waveform amplitude equal to 1. It is corrected for AGC instrumental errors (agc_cor_20_ku) and internal calibration (sig0_cal_20_ku)

attributes.long_name: corrected tracker range for 20Hz in Ku band
attributes.comment: LRM mode : tracker range corrected for USO frequency drift (uso_cor_20_ku), internal path (int_path_cor_20_ku) and Doppler correction (dop_cor_l1b_20_ku) SAR mode : reference range corrected for USO frequency drift (uso_cor_20_ku) and internal path correction (int_path_cor_20_ku)

attributes.long_name: corrected AGC at 20Hz PLRM Ku band
attributes.comment: AGC corrected for instrumental errors (agc_cor_20_plrm). For SAR mode, closest value in time to the reference measurement

attributes.long_name: quality flag for AGC at 20Hz PLRM Ku band
attributes.comment: Flag indicating the use of the 20Hz estimate of AGC in the computation of 1Hz estimate

attributes.long_name: scaling factor for backscatter coefficient evaluation at 20Hz PLRM Ku band
attributes.comment: This scaling factor represents the backscatter coefficient for a waveform amplitude equal to 1. It is corrected for AGC instrumental errors (agc_cor_20_plrm) and internal calibration (sig0_cal_20_plrm)

attributes.long_name: corrected tracker range for 20Hz PLRM Ku band
attributes.comment: LRM/PLRM mode : tracker range corrected for USO frequency drift (uso_cor_20_c), internal path (int_path_cor_20_plrm) and Doppler correction (dop_cor_l1b_20_plrm) SAR mode : reference range corrected for USO frequency drift (uso_cor_20_c) and internal path correction (int_path_cor_20_plrm)

attributes.comment: LRM mode : ocean retracking, SAR mode : coastal retracking

attributes.comment: LRM mode : ocean retracking, SAR mode : coastal retracking

attributes.comment: LRM mode : ocean retracking, SAR mode : coastal retracking

attributes.comment: LRM mode : ocean retracking, SAR mode : coastal retracking

attributes.long_name: corrected water altimeter range for 20Hz C band
attributes.comment: LRM mode : ocean retracking, SAR mode : coastal retracking. Instrumental corrections included : USO drift correction (uso_cor_20_c), internal path correction (int_path_cor_20_c), distance antenna-COG (cog_cor_01), Doppler correction (dop_cor_20_c), modeled instrumental errors correction (mod_instr_cor_range_01_c) and system bias

attributes.long_name: number of valid points used to compute the water altimeter range for 1Hz C band
attributes.comment: LRM mode : ocean retracking, SAR mode : coastal retracking

attributes.long_name: quality flag for the water altimeter range at 20Hz C band
attributes.comment: LRM mode : ocean retracking, SAR mode : coastal retracking. Flag indicating the use of the 20Hz estimate of the water altimeter range in the computation of 1Hz estimate

attributes.long_name: RMS of the water altimeter range for 1Hz C band
attributes.comment: LRM mode : ocean retracking, SAR mode : coastal retracking. Compression of high rate elements is preceded by a detection of outliers. Only valid high-rate values are used to compute this element

attributes.long_name: corrected water backscatter coefficient at 1Hz C band
attributes.comment: LRM mode : ocean retracking, SAR mode : coastal retracking. Instrumental corrections included : AGC instrumental errors correction, internal calibration correction, modeled instrumental errors correction, atmospheric attenuation correction and system bias.

attributes.comment: LRM mode : ocean retracking, SAR mode : coastal retracking

attributes.long_name: corrected altimeter elevation from OCOG (ice-1) retracker at 20Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: LRM mode : OCOG (ice-1) retracking, SAR mode : OCOG (ice-1) retracking. Instrumental corrections included : USO drift correction (uso_cor_[x1]_[x2]), internal path correction (int_path_cor_[x1]_[x2]), distance antenna-COG (cog_cor_[x1]_[x2]) and Doppler slope correction (dop_slope_cor_[x1]_[x2]). Geophysical corrections included: GIM-derived ionospheric correction on Ku band (iono_cor_gim_[x1]_ku), model dry tropospheric correction (mod_dry_tropo_cor_meas_altitude_[x1]_[x2]),  model wet tropospheric correction (mod_wet_tropo_cor_meas_altitude_[x1]_[x2]), solid earth tide height (solid_earth_tide_[x1]_[x2]), geocentric ocean tide height solution 2 = FES (ocean_tide_sol2_[x1]_[x2] on ocean/semi-enclosed seas only), geocentric pole tide height (pole_tide_[x1]_[x2]), ocean loading tide solution 2 = FES (load_tide_sol2_[x1]_[x2] on land only), inverted barometer height correction (inv_bar_cor_[x1] on ocean/semi-enclosed seas only), high frequency fluctuations of the sea surface topography (hf_fluct_cor_[x1] for NTC/STC products only, on ocean/semi-enclosed seas only). A height slope correction is applied.

attributes.long_name: corrected OCOG altimeter range at 20Hz C band
attributes.comment: SAR mode : OCOG retracking. Instrumental corrections included : USO drift correction (uso_cor_20_c), internal path correction (int_path_cor_20_c), distance antenna-COG

attributes.long_name: corrected OCOG altimeter range at 20Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: SAR mode : OCOG retracking. Instrumental corrections included : USO drift correction (uso_cor_20_ku), internal path correction (int_path_cor_20_ku), distance antenna-COG

attributes.long_name: corrected sea-ice altimeter range at 20Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: SAR mode only : sea-ice margin retracking. Instrumental corrections included : USO drift correction (uso_cor_20_ku), internal path correction (int_path_cor_20_ku), distance antenna-COG and Doppler slope correction (dop_slope_cor_20_ku)

attributes.long_name: corrected sea-ice backscatter coefficient at 20Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: SAR mode only : sea-ice margin retracking. Instrumental corrections included : AGC instrumental errors correction (agc_cor_20_ku) and internal calibration correction (sig0_cal_20_ku)

attributes.long_name: altimeter-derived ocean surface type classification at 20Hz Ku band
Inverted barometer height correction at 1Hz
attributes.comment: computed at the altimeter time-tag from the interpolation of 2 meteorological fields that surround the altimeter time-tag
attributes.source: European Centre for Medium Range Weather Forecast

attributes.long_name: model dry tropospheric correction at measurement altitude at 1Hz
attributes.comment: computed from 3D meteorological model at measurement altitude, at the altimeter time-tag from the interpolation of 2 meteorological fields that surround the altimeter time-tag. A dry tropospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for dry tropospheric delays of the radar pulse
attributes.source: European Centre for Medium Range Weather Forecast

attributes.long_name: model dry tropospheric correction at zero altitude at 1Hz
attributes.comment: computed from 3D meteorological model at zero altitude, at the altimeter time-tag from the interpolation of 2 meteorological fields that surround the altimeter time-tag. A dry tropospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for dry tropospheric delays of the radar pulse
attributes.source: European Centre for Medium Range Weather Forecast

attributes.long_name: model wet tropospheric correction at measurement altitude at 1Hz
attributes.comment: computed from 3D meteorological model at measurement altitude, at the altimeter time-tag from the interpolation of 2 meteorological fields that surround the altimeter time-tag. A wet tropospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for wet tropospheric delays of the radar pulse
attributes.source: European Centre for Medium Range Weather Forecast

attributes.long_name: model wet tropospheric correction at zero altitude at 1Hz
attributes.comment: computed from 3D meteorological model at zero altitude, at the altimeter time-tag from the interpolation of 2 meteorological fields that surround the altimeter time-tag. A wet tropospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for wet tropospheric delays of the radar pulse
attributes.source: European Centre for Medium Range Weather Forecast

attributes.long_name: atmospheric attenuation correction on the backscatter coefficient at 1Hz C band
sea state bias correction at 1Hz C band
attributes.comment: A sea state bias correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for roughness delays of the radar pulse.
attributes.source: Empirical solution fitted on Jason-2 GDR_C data

attributes.long_name: atmospheric attenuation correction on the backscatter coefficient at 1Hz Ku band
composite wet tropospheric correction at 1Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: computed at the altimeter time-tag from radiometer or model corrections over areas where the radiometer wet troposphere correction is missing or supposed invalid due to the proximity of emerged lands, coastal areas and/or radiometer gaps in open oceans. A wet tropospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for wet tropospheric delays of the radar pulse

attributes.long_name: altimeter ionospheric correction at 20Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for ionospheric delays of the radar pulse. This correction is valid over ocean surfaces only

attributes.long_name: altimeter ionospheric range filtered at 1Hz Ku Band
attributes.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for ionospheric delays of the radar pulse. This correction is valid over ocean surfaces only

attributes.long_name: GIM ionospheric correction at 1Hz
attributes.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for ionospheric delays of the radar pulse.

attributes.long_name: radiometer wet tropospheric correction at 1Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: A wet tropospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for wet tropospheric delays of the radar pulse. This correction is valid over ocean surfaces only

attributes.long_name: radiometer and sst wet tropospheric correction at 1Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: computed at the altimeter time-tag from the radiometer brightness temperatures, the Ku-band backscatter coefficient, the sea surface temperature and the lapse rate (decreasing rate of the atmosphere temperature with altitude). A wet tropospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for wet tropospheric delays of the radar pulse

attributes.long_name: sea state bias correction at 1Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: A sea state bias correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for roughness delays of the radar pulse.
attributes.source: Empirical solution fitted on Jason-2 GDR_C data

attributes.long_name: atmospheric attenuation correction on the backscatter coefficient at 1Hz PLRM Ku band
composite wet tropospheric correction at 1Hz PLRM Ku band
attributes.comment: computed at the altimeter time-tag from radiometer or model corrections over areas where the radiometer wet troposphere correction is missing or supposed invalid due to the proximity of emerged lands, coastal areas and/or radiometer gaps in open oceans. A wet tropospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for wet tropospheric delays of the radar pulse

attributes.long_name: altimeter ionospheric correction at 20Hz PLRM Ku band
attributes.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for ionospheric delays of the radar pulse. This correction is valid over ocean surfaces only

attributes.long_name: altimeter ionospheric range filtered at 1Hz PLRM Ku Band
attributes.comment: An ionospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for ionospheric delays of the radar pulse. This correction is valid over ocean surfaces only

attributes.long_name: radiometer wet tropospheric correction at 1Hz PLRM Ku band
attributes.comment: A wet tropospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for wet tropospheric delays of the radar pulse. This correction is valid over ocean surfaces only

attributes.long_name: radiometer and sst wet tropospheric correction at 1Hz PLRM Ku band
attributes.comment: computed at the altimeter time-tag from the radiometer brightness temperature, the Ku-band backscatter coefficient, the sea surface temperature and the lapse rate (decreasing rate of the atmosphere temperature with altitude). A wet tropospheric correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for wet tropospheric delays of the radar pulse

attributes.long_name: sea state bias correction at 1Hz PLRM Ku band
attributes.comment: A sea state bias correction must be added (negative value) to the instrument range to correct this range measurement for roughness delays of the radar pulse.
attributes.source: Empirical solution fitted on Jason-2 GDR_C data

attributes.long_name: number of samples in the waveforms
attributes.comment: set to be compliant with the CF-1.6 convention

attributes.long_name: maximum number of multilook beams per stack
attributes.comment: set to be compliant with the CF-1.6 convention

attributes.long_name: look angles in stack at 20Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: These are looking angles and not beam angles. The useful values of the table are the first n_useful values where n_useful is the number of waveforms summed in stack (nb_stack_20_ku)

attributes.long_name: flag on beam formation quality in stack at 20Hz Ku band
kurtosis of stack at 20Hz Ku band
location of the maximum power of stack at 20Hz Ku band
maximum power of stack at 20Hz Ku band
range integrated power of stack at 20Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: the useful values of the table are the first nb_stack_20_ku values, one value of power for each individual echo

attributes.long_name: skewness of stack at 20Hz Ku band
standard deviation of stack at 20Hz Ku band
number of samples in I2+Q2 waveforms
attributes.comment: set to be compliant with the CF-1.6 convention

attributes.long_name: waveform samples (I2+Q2) at 20Hz C band
attributes.comment: LRM mode Ku and C bands: the echo is corrected for the GPRW effect, SAR mode C band : the echo is the so-called averaged echo corrected for the GPRW effect, SAR mode Ku band : the echo is corrected for Doppler range effect, phase/power burst calibration and GPRW effect

attributes.long_name: waveform samples (I2+Q2) at 20Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: LRM mode Ku and C bands: the echo is corrected for the GPRW effect, SAR mode C band : the echo is the so-called averaged echo corrected for the GPRW effect, SAR mode Ku band : the echo is corrected for Doppler range effect, phase/power burst calibration and GPRW effect

attributes.long_name: waveform samples (I2+Q2) at 20Hz PLRM Ku band
attributes.comment: LRM mode Ku and C bands: the echo is corrected for the GPRW effect, SAR mode C band : the echo is the so-called averaged echo corrected for the GPRW effect, SAR mode PLRM Ku band : the echo is corrected for Doppler range effect, phase/power burst calibration and GPRW effect

attributes.comment: nadir doppler correction on the altimeter range

attributes.comment: internal calibration correction on the altimeter range

attributes.long_name: modeled instrumental correction on the altimeter range at 1Hz C band
modeled instrumental correction on the backscatter coefficient at 1Hz C band
modeled instrumental correction on the significant wave height at 1Hz C band
net instrumental correction on the altimeter range at 20Hz C band
attributes.comment: sum of distance antenna-COG, USO drift correction (uso_cor_20_c), internal path correction (int_path_cor_20_c), L2 Doppler correction update (dop_cor_20_c - dop_cor_l1b_20_c), modeled instrumental errors correction (mod_instr_cor_range_01_c) and system bias

attributes.long_name: net instrumental correction on the backscatter coefficient at 20Hz C band
attributes.comment: sum of AGC instrumental errors correction (agc_cor_20_c), internal calibration correction (sig0_cal_20_c), modeled instrumental errors correction (mod_instr_cor_sig0_01_c) and system bias.

attributes.long_name: net instrumental correction on the significant wave height at 20Hz C band
attributes.comment: sum of modeled instrumental errors correction (mod_instr_cor_swh_01_c) and system bias

attributes.comment: sum of modeled instrumental errors correction (mod_instr_cor_swh_01_ku) and system bias

radiometer derived surface type at 1Hz

distance to the coast at 20Hz Ku band

attributes.long_name: snow depth at 20Hz Ku band
surface classification at 20Hz Ku band
attributes.flag_meanings: open_ocean land continental_water aquatic_vegetation continental_ice_snow floating_ice salted_basin
attributes.comment: computed from a classification built with MODIS and GlobCover data

attributes.long_name: surface type at 20Hz Ku band
surface type at 20Hz C band
geoid height at 1Hz
attributes.comment: computed from the geoid model with a correction to refer the value to the mean tide system i.e. includes the permanent tide (zero frequency)

attributes.long_name: load tide height for geocentric ocean tide (solution 1) at 1Hz
attributes.comment: This value has already been added to the corresponding ocean tide height value recorded in the product (ocean_tide_sol1_01).

attributes.long_name: load tide height for geocentric ocean tide (solution 2) at 1Hz
attributes.comment: This value contains the total load tide height (short-period and long-period) for the geocentric ocean tide (solution 2). To get only the pure ocean tide height (solution 2), do: ocean_tide_sol2_01 + ocean_tide_non_eq_01 - load_tide_sol2_01. This value has already been added to the corresponding ocean tide height value recorded in the product (ocean_tide_sol2_01).

attributes.long_name: equilibrium long-period ocean tide height at 1Hz
attributes.comment: This value has already been added to the two geocentric ocean tide height values recorded in the product (ocean_tide_sol1_01 and ocean_tide_sol2_01). The permanent tide (zero frequency) is not included in this parameter because it is included in the geoid and mean sea surface (geoid_01, mean_sea_surf_sol1_01).
attributes.source: Cartwright and Edden [1973] Corrected tables of tidal harmonics - J. Geophys. J. R. Astr. Soc., 33, 253-264.

attributes.long_name: non-equilibrium long-period ocean tide height at 1Hz
attributes.comment: This parameter is computed as a correction to the parameter ocean_tide_eq_01; it contains the long-period ocean tide and the long-period load tide components. This value can be added to ocean_tide_eq_01 (or ocean_tide_sol1_01, ocean_tide_sol2_01) so that the resulting value gives the total non equilibrium ocean tide height.

attributes.long_name: geocentric ocean tide height (solution 1) at 1Hz
attributes.comment: Solution 1 corresponds to GOT model and includes the corresponding loading tide (load_tide_sol1_01) and equilibrium long-period ocean tide height (ocean_tide_eq_01). The permanent tide (zero frequency) is not included in this parameter because it is included in the geoid and mean sea surface (geoid_01, mean_sea_surf_sol1_01).

attributes.long_name: geocentric ocean tide height (solution 2) at 1Hz
attributes.comment: Solution 2 corresponds to FES model and includes the corresponding short-period part of the loading tide (load_tide_sol2_01) and equilibrium long-period ocean tide height (ocean_tide_eq_01). The permanent tide (zero frequency) is not included in this parameter because it is included in the geoid and mean sea surface (geoid_01, mean_sea_surf_sol1_01).

attributes.long_name: ocean depth or land elevation at 1Hz
geocentric tide height at 1Hz
attributes.source: Wahr [1985] Deformation of the Earth induced by polar motion - J. Geophys. Res. (Solid Earth), 90, 9363-9368.

attributes.long_name: solid earth tide height at 1Hz
attributes.comment: It is calculated using Cartwright and Tayler tables and consists of the second and third degree constituents. The permanent tide (zero frequency) is not included.
attributes.source: Cartwright and Edden [1973] Corrected tables of tidal harmonics - J. Geophys. J. R. Astr. Soc., 33, 253-264.

attributes.long_name: U component of the model wind vector at 1Hz
attributes.comment: computed at the altimeter time-tag from the interpolation of 2 meteorological fields that surround the altimeter time-tag
attributes.source: European Centre for Medium Range Weather Forecast

attributes.long_name: V component of the model wind vector at 1Hz
attributes.comment: computed at the altimeter time-tag from the interpolation of 2 meteorological fields that surround the altimeter time-tag
attributes.source: European Centre for Medium Range Weather Forecast

attributes.long_name: radiometer liquid water content at 1Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: this should not be used over land

attributes.long_name: radiometer water vapor content at 1Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: this should not be used over land

snow density at 20Hz Ku band
altimeter wind speed at 1Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: this should not be used over land

attributes.long_name: rain attenuation at 1Hz PLRM Ku band
altimeter wind speed at 1Hz PLRM Ku band
attributes.comment: this should not be used over land

attributes.long_name: off nadir pitch angle derived from platform data at 1Hz
off nadir roll angle derived from platform data at 1Hz
off nadir yaw angle derived from platform data at 1Hz
corrected square of the off nadir angle derived from waveforms at 1Hz Ku band
modeled instrumental correction on the square of the off-nadir angle at 1Hz Ku band
number of valid points used to compute the off-nadir angle derived from waveforms at 1Hz Ku band
RMS of the square of the off-nadir angle derived from waveforms at 1Hz Ku band
attributes.comment: Compression of high-rate elements is preceded by a detection of outliers. Only valid high-rate values are used to compute this value.

attributes.long_name: flag indicating the use of the 20Hz estimate of the square of the off-nadir angle in the computation of 1Hz estimate
attributes.comment: LRM mode : ocean retracking , SAR mode : coastal retracking

attributes.long_name: validity flag for the square of the off nadir angle derived from waveforms at 1Hz Ku band
corrected square of the off nadir angle derived from waveforms at 1Hz PLRM Ku band
attributes.comment: This parameter is issued from the ocean retracking in LRM mode and from the coastal retracking in SAR mode. It accounts for modeled instrumental errors correction (mod_instr_cor_off_nadir_angle_01_plrm) and system bias.

attributes.long_name: modeled instrumental correction on the square of the off-nadir angle at 1Hz PLRM Ku band
number of valid points used to compute the off-nadir angle derived from waveforms at 1Hz PLRM Ku band
RMS of the square of the off-nadir angle derived from waveforms at 1Hz PLRM Ku band
attributes.comment: Compression of high-rate elements is preceded by a detection of outliers. Only valid high-rate values are used to compute this element.

attributes.long_name: flag indicating the use of the 20Hz estimate of the square of the off-nadir angle in the computation of 1Hz estimate
attributes.comment: LRM mode : ocean retracking , SAR mode : coastal retracking

attributes.long_name: validity flag for the square of the off nadir angle derived from waveforms at 1Hz PLRM Ku band
